alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 8:39PM PST until December 19 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Washington, Willapa Hills. In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For elevations below 1000 feet, rain may mix with snow or fall as all snow for brief periods of time. Little to no snow accumulation is expected for elevations below 500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
